text: Uye rangarirai Allah pamazuva akatarwa. Asi uyo anokurumidza kuenda mumazuva maviri (musi wa 11 na 12), hapana chitadzo kwaari; uyezve uyo anononoka kuenda, hapana chitadzo kwaari, kana chinangwa chake chiri chokuita zvakanaka uye kuremekedza Allah, uye zivai kuti zvirokwazvo muchaunganidzwa kwavari
